SKU306573.Name: As You Wish Upholstered Settee
SKU306573.Description: Customize our As You Wish Settee by choosing from an amazing array of prints, colors and profiles. Mix and match the settee with a custom As You Wish Storage Bench and Headboard for a completely personalized look.

Solid rubberwood legs in light grey stain
Fabric is custom printed and made of 100% cotton
Due to the nature of design variation can be expected from piece to piece

Spot clean using distilled water and water-based cleaning agents or foam only. Always test a small inconspicuous area first. Blot spills immediately with a clean, absorbent white cloth.
